title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Easy cross-cloud authN : AWS outbound identity federation in action (SEC233)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 简化跨云身份验证：AWS出站身份联合实践 (SEC233)
abstract: Does your AWS workload need to access Azure, Databricks, or other external services? Join us to learn how outbound identity federation can enable you to securely authenticate your AWS workloads with a wide range of cloud providers, SaaS platforms and self-hosted applications.. Through a live demo, we'll show how to federate an AWS identity into a third-party cloud provider, demonstrating how to generate standards-based JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) that can be exchanged for access tokens from external services.
abstract_cn: 您的AWS工作负载是否需要访问Azure、Databricks或其他外部服务？加入我们，了解出站身份联合如何让您安全地将AWS工作负载与各种云提供商、SaaS平台和自托管应用程序进行身份验证。通过现场演示，我们将展示如何将AWS身份联合到第三方云提供商，演示如何生成基于标准的JSON Web令牌(JWT)，这些令牌可以与外部服务的访问令牌进行交换。
